rooms.description: A welcoming space with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light.
Spacious area for family gatherings, incorporating bohemian elements and vibrant color schemes.
A dining space with ample seating that can be converted to a work area if needed.
Modern kitchen designed for joint family usage, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and ample storage. Vastu compliant with the placement of sink and stove.
A luxurious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, a private balcony and built-in storage. Vastu guidelines ensure east-facing window for energy flow.
Cozy bedroom designed with bohemian decor and vibrant colors. Includes a study area.
Well-appointed guest room that can double as office space, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample light.
Compact but comfortable quarters designed with essential amenities. Includes a small kitchenette and bathroom.
Space for laundry, storage, and other utilities.
A private swimming pool area with a sun deck and seating. The pool is designed to be in harmony with the cottage layout and offers a relaxing outdoor space.

openings.description: Large entry door leading to the entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling glass panels.
Access to private balconies from master bedroom and guest room.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living areas and bedrooms for enhanced natural light.
Dedicated entrance to servant quarters, ensuring privacy and convenience.
